name: Polls
author: Kuro
install_msg:
Thank you for installing `Polls`.
`[p]poll` uses embed to make a poll, so users will be unable to run the command if the bot doesn't have embed permissions.
description: Create a poll with up to 10 options. Inspired by Dyno.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not persistently store data or metadata about users.
